title: Which is the original skmei watches website?
comments: I purchased one from Flipkart and got the duplicate:(

skmei.in
Any other site is an authorised seller. Flipkart has been consistent with their "fake" SKMEIs ( ironic, considering what SKMEI does ). Skmei.in doesn't have much collection. Amazon do seem to source authentic skmei
